snippet: The president, in an October letter to Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, said that a nuclear agreement and supporting the fight against the Islamic State would help Iran.
abstract: Pres Obama sends letter to Iran's supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, urging him to seize opportunity of deadline for negotiating a nuclear agreement with the West; argues that Iran's interests in Middle East would be served by proving its interest in nuclear technology is solely for the production of electricity.
lead_paragraph: The president, in an October letter to Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, said that a nuclear agreement and supporting the fight against the Islamic State would help Iran.

headline.main: Obama Urged Iranian Leader to See Common Interests
headline.print_headline: Obama Urged Iranian Leader to See Common Interests

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
